ValidationRule.description: No new Opportunity notes can be added once a Sale has been closed out; the notes must be added in the Implementation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Won") && ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "401(k)" ) && CloseDate > DATE(2017,1,9) && Agreement_for_Services_A4S__c = True && Payment_Information__c = True && ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Notes__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add new Notes on the Implementations Object
